subject: Re: [junit] Junit can't find my test classes
msgSnippet: Hai You can try this way, put your junit jar into Ant lib folder. then you try to execute your script. I thing problem comes in this line of code
messageBody:
Hai

You can try this way, put your junit jar into Ant lib folder.
then you try to execute your script. I thing problem comes in this line of
code <classpath refid="project.classpath"/>. Do this way first, if it
is not work inform me.





Paul Domnic J.
